pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, December 9, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a candle lighting ceremony in celebration of Hanukkah, and deliver brief remarks.

Valour Building
Room 268
151 Sparks Street

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
